entries.s_faf1fbe4: You there! Are you handy with a set of tools? Eh... looks like you're too busy to help me anyway. Nevermind.
entries.s_fae10418: What are you doing here? You shouldn't be here!
entries.s_f1a421d: Say, I know you. They tell me you've been a great help. Good job.
entries.s_ebabb0f8: You there! Are you handy with a set of tools?
entries.s_e26f0607: Of course you understand that this job will take a while, and if you agree to fix this thing, you won't be able to help anyone else with anything for a while, right?
entries.s_e05cc4d4: What's going on here? I'm all confused! I don't know what's going on!
entries.s_c9f1dbdc: That doesn't sound like something that I can do.
entries.s_be3bc184: Hey! You got that all fixed up, didn't you? And just in time. You're all right, you know that?
entries.s_b2dd509a: Great. Our sensor array was damaged in the last attack on this village by the Sith Shadows. It needs to be repaired, but unfortunately, our chief engineer was also killed in the attack.
entries.s_a4a9c8e0: Oh, in that case I'd rather not do it.
entries.s_9cdcc110: That's it exactly. You catch on quick. If you will, take a look at the damage, see what needs to be repaired, and fix it up for us.
entries.s_9ae334e4: I think that I can handle that.
entries.s_8d878ba7: That's a shame. If you find someone who can... send 'em over.
entries.s_8abf86da: You want me to take a look at the sensor array?
entries.s_8459377a: Yes, I will go repair the sensor array.
entries.s_75cdc0ad: On second thought, I don't think that I can help you.
entries.s_6a934b47: Master... I must find the master.
entries.s_5ec4a1e: Alright, well if you see someone who is... send 'em over.
entries.s_52acc0: That's a shame. If you find someone who will... send 'em over.
entries.s_27808b0b: Good show! If you help us out with this, I will help you learn to use the Force to enhance your assembly skills.
entries.s_1b7f8e6d: Good! You'd better get to work then. The sooner we get that thing back online, the better!
entries.s_16cc0ae1: What are you waiting for? Go get that sensor array repaired!
entries.do_not_edit: The English version of this file (village_quharek.stf) is automatically generated by the SwgConversationEditor.
